name: Waiting Room (itch) (Atley)
description:
This is a story I've been curious about for a while, about a woman who is cryonically preserved and awoken in the future.  I wanted to test out doing different styles of gameplay and integrating gameplay and narrative.  I envisioned a much larger story, but I'm reworking it all in a new way.  So I'll just release this chapter as it is. 

Character Art, 2D and 3D, Title Art: Wesley Allsbrook (@wesleyallsbrook)

https://www.wesleyallsbrook.com/about-1

Music: Liz Ryerson (@ellaguro)

https://ellaguro.bandcamp.com/

Title Music: Jacob Knipfing (@videogams)

Modeling Help: Liz Walcher (@cynomaniac)
